data.name: Large Birch Wardrobe
data.description: A tall wardrobe made from birch that is quite common in Mondstadt, and which can be counted on contain clothes for all seasons.\nThat said, this spaciousness has come with its own fair share of challenges â€” for example, due to various complaints sent by children to Sister Grace, the Church of Favonius now sends a deaconess to pray over each cupboard that comes out of the workshop such that it will not contain scary ghosts, stinky boars, or alcoholic fathers drunk out of their gourds.
